dialogue.introduction: Michishio here. Why did I get assigned to such a fleet?
dialogue.library_intro: I'm a destroyer, Michishio. I and my sisters Asashio, Ooshio, and Arashio were somehow assigned to the 8th destroyer squadron. But, we were separated in the end. Finally I broke into Leyte, as a member of Nishimura fleet.
dialogue.secretary2: What is it? I don't get what you mean.
dialogue.secretaryidle: If we're going, then go. If we're not, then don't. Please do it properly! Geez...
dialogue.secretarymarried: Reeaaally! This squadron is really lukewarm huh? We're not playing friendly, you know! ...I'm also a friend you say...? I-It's not like I'm happy about it...
dialogue.wedding: I've gotten better at fighting since the beginning, haven't I?... I don't hate it.
dialogue.equipment1: Aa, that's right, you meant to say that my power alone is not enough!
dialogue.equipment2: W-what is it, did you mean to patronize me?
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Like this, it's too early to be docked.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Getting the fleet wiped out while I'm being repaired or the likes, don't do that.
dialogue.docking_complete: They said that the repair is complete.
dialogue.ship_construction: A new ship is ready. Take a look?
dialogue.start_a_sortie: It's ridiculous if I don't sortie.
dialogue.night_battle: How foolish, what lies ahead is hell.
dialogue.mvp: Don't go planning boring operation, tch!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: You did something interesting, huh. I'll return it twice over!
dialogue.fall_2015: Autumn, huh? This season makes me feel a bit down. Huh? Say what, commander? It's not like I want others to be nice to me or anything... I'm fine!
dialogue.christmas_2015: "You have a Christmas cake." I'm not going to eat something so swe...Ah...I'll eat it...Yeah...
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: All right, there's a feeling like we've overcome something. Time to head off with the cleaning in new feelings! Gather up, 4th and 8th destroyer divisions. We will do cleaning with full power!
dialogue.new_year_2016: A new year, huh. Commander I'll say this once... Please take care of me this year as well. Th-That's all!
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Setsubun? Is there any meaning to this event? Ow, you guys?! Why are you throwing with such force!? Wh-What is it!? What's your purpose!?
